troubleshooting.title: Temel sorun giderme
troubleshooting.description:
A) Aşağıdaki uygulamaların verilerini ve ön belleklerini silin 

(I) Root olmayan varyant için Vanced/Vanced Music ve microG
(II) Root varyant için Vanced/Vanced Music ve Google Play Servisleri

B) YouTube Vanced'i baştan kurun

ÖNEMLİ UYARI: İşlemler arasında cihazınızı yeniden başlatın

troubleshooting.title: Oturum açma sorunları
troubleshooting.description: Sık karşılaşılan bazı hataları gösteren birtakım görüntüler aşağıdadır, izleyeceğiniz çözümde size fikir verebilir.

fields.title: "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin" diyen bir hata alıyorsanız
fields.content: Şu video kılavuzu izleyin: https://youtu.be/S5sTXRTrD5Y. MicroG'nin uygulama verilerini de silin.

fields.title: Giriş yaparken "Çevrim dışısınız, indirilenlere göz atın" uyarısıyla karşılaşıyorsanız
fields.content:
1. Clear DATA of both Vanced microG and Google Play services
2. UNINSTALL both "Vanced microG" and Vanced.

3. Reboot if you want.

4. Reinstall both APKs[microG and Vanced) but make sure you install microG before you install Vanced. Install via Vanced Manager or sai using files provided in #installation note in group

5. Now login.

NOTE: If you're still having issues with Vanced giving connection errors (even after installing microG first), receiving notifications, etc, make sure you disable battery optimization for the Vanced and microG app. 

Instructions to do so vary on your device manufacturer. You can folloe guides like https://dontkillmyapp.com or search it up.

fields.title: Vanced uygulaması Google oturumunuzu kapatıyorsa
fields.content:
It happens because your device OS' heavy battery optimization killing microg services/activities which are responsible for logins.

To fix this, disable battery optimization for microG using https://dontkillmyapp.com OR searching it up

fields.title: Vanced'in root olmayan sürümünde Gsuite hesabını kullanıp bağlantı üzerine sık sık hata alan (ör. "Çevrim dışısınız", "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin") kullanıcılar için
fields.content:
•Log into your Gsuite account [admin console](https://admin.google.com/)

• Search for device management

• Go to setup and disable "Mobile Management"

• That's it and it will get fixed.

fields.title: Huawei geçici çözümü - 1
fields.content: Use the Huawei spoof button when signing in wih latest available vanced microG using vanced manager.

fields.title: Huawei geçici çözümü - 2
fields.content:
For those who updated microG to most recent version but now are facing login issues

1. Uninstall current installed Vanced microG.

2. Download "Vanced microG 0.2.12.203316 version" from mega cloud storage mirror [Link to Vanced microG](https://del.dog/vancedv15above)

3. You should be able to login now.

fields.title: Huawei geçici çözümü - 3
fields.content:
1. Uninstall both vanced and microG if you already installed. Then reinstall only microG(latest available)

2. Then open microG app settings

3. Turn off both "Google Cloud Messaging" and "Google device registration".

4. Add your account through microG itself.

5. Then install Vanced.

fields.title: Huawei workaround 4
fields.content:
1. First, install the old Vanced microG version{particularly microg_YouTube_Vanced_0.2.4-105_16052019_2.apk using [this link](https://www.mediafire.com/file/4mw2q6ajq85g2io/microg_YouTube_Vanced_0.2.4-105_16052019_2.apk/file)}. Make sure to uninstall the current version to install the above version and save the latest APK file as you will be needing it later.

2. Then open YouTube Vanced and try logging in again until it shows the error message. Try to reload it by tapping the error message. 

3. Now install the newer microG version again and restart vanced. It should be logged in again and everything should work again.

NOTE: Now make sure u disable battery optimization for both microG and vanced using https://dontkillmyapp.com otherwise your device software might kill microG and you might have to repeat all above steps again to fix login.

fields.title: Vanced Manager logoda takılıp kalması/çökmesi hatası
fields.content: Manager uygulamasının verilerini silin > İnternet bağlantısını kesin > Manager uygulamasını açın > İnternet'e bağlanın.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_APK: No packages staged
fields.content: Önce Google Play mağazasındaki Youtube uygulamasını yükleyin, sonra Vanced Manager'ı açıp Vanced'i güncelleyin.

fields.title: Vanced Manager "Lütfen sabırlı olun" yazan pencerede takılıp kalıyorsa
fields.content: Önce Google Play mağazasındaki Youtube uygulamasını yükleyin, sonra Vanced Manager'ı açıp Vanced'i güncelleyin.

fields.title: If you face "Error downloading Microg/Vanced" or installation got stuck while installing microg/vanced app
fields.content: Manager uygulamasının verilerini silin ve sonra yüklemeye devam edin, BU SIRADA İŞLEM BİTENE DEK BAŞKA BİR UYGULAMAYA GEÇMEYİN.

troubleshooting.title: Notification fix
troubleshooting.description: For notification fix, a white background or Vanced not appearing under "Google Cloud Messaging", see below

fields.title: For Non-Root
fields.content:
1. Install Vanced microG first then YouTube Vanced.

2. Login with your Google account

3. 
a) Disable battery optimization for microg(the guide dontkillmyapp.com is suggested).

b)**Open "Vanced microG" additional settings then continue on with this guide:

i) https://youtu.be/Q-5YFmFWVok

fields.title: If Vanced is not showing up under GCM or it shows up as unregistered
fields.content:
Try EITHER of the following:

1. Remove your google account from account settings. The account used by vanced has old Blue background color with small g logo.

2. Clear data of microG then login. 

OR

If above workaround doesn't work, reinstall vanced.

fields.title: For Root
fields.content:
Make sure "Scheduled Digest" is off in youtube settings and your notifications sounds are correct and set.

You can try using "notification manager" app which keeps track of all your notification at one place so in case if you are dismissing your notifications, you can access the same again from that app.

fields.title: "İşlem başarısız çünkü apk dosyaları geçersiz veya bozulmuş" gibi hatalar için
fields.content: • Manager ayarlarını açın ve indirilen dosyaları temizleyin\n\n• Ardından Manager uygulamasının verilerini silin ve sonrasında Vanced'i yükleyin.

troubleshooting.title: Force closing issues
troubleshooting.description: If Vanced app is crashing/force closing on startup

fields.title: Nonroot
fields.content:
1) If the non-root Vanced app is force closing before installing MicroG, uninstall both Vanced app and MicroG. Then install MicroG first, then Vanced. The issue should be fixed.

2) If the non-root Vanced app is force closing without installing microg, install microg. [If you don't want to login, don't login and only install microg apk as vanced has a dependency on microg for connecting with Google services]

fields.title: Root
fields.content:
1) If your root version of Vanced is force closing upon opening the app, uninstall stock YouTube app updates. If this doesn't help, disable/uninstall your substratum/swift themes overlays.
At last resort, if nothing helps, give the community/staff a logcat.

2) If your root version of Vanced is force closing in middle of app when it's in foreground/active or playing a video, grab your logcats and find:

(a)- Unsatisfiedlinkerror: 
Sol:- Open file manager and go to root storage.
Then open "system/app/youtube/lib" OR "Data/app/com.google.android.youtube/lib" and rename 

arm64-v8a to arm64

armeabi-v7a to arm

and it will get fixed.

Also, if both "arm and arm64" are not there in that directory above, try getting both from official YT apk or ask your friends and extract it there in that directory

(b)- Notehitelisted "com.google.android.youtube":
Sol:- Check whitelisting from here(todo)

If you don't know how to get logs, check bugreport note

fields.title: If Vanced crashes in the middle of playback (when playing in background mode)
fields.content:
Since this issue is only caused by aggressive battery optimization present in various OEM skins such as MIUI, Emui, ColorOS, etc..., it is recommended to disable battery optimization for both Vanced and MicroG app. 

Instructions to do so vary on your device manufacturer, so we can’t really assist with helping you disable it. You can try using a site like "dontkillmyapp.com", OR using Google and searching “[phone manufacturer] [phone model] [Android version] disable battery optimization”

However, if you still have this issue, provide #bugreport on telegram or in discord with the details it requires and logs must be there so that Mods can take a look what's actually causing. Also, make sure to grab logs specific to vanced, NOT your whole SYSTEM.

troubleshooting.title: Uninstall on reboot
troubleshooting.description:
If the root version of YouTube Vanced/ YouTube Music Vanced is disappearing/uninstalling/reverting back to stock on reboot,

We have 2 solutions available for you

fields.title: Solution 1
fields.content: Stick to the non-root version until the devs fix this.

fields.title: Solution 2
fields.content:
REQUIREMENTS: 

Vanced Manager 2.1.0 or newer
A root manager like Es File Explorer or Root Browser
Step 1: Go into /data/adb/service.d/ and edit the script Music.sh and or Vanced.sh

They both should look like something similar to this :

while  [ "`getprop sys.boot_completed | tr -d '
'`" != "1" ] ; do sleep 1; done 

Step 2: Change value of  "do sleep 1; done"   to   "do sleep 2; done"

Step 3: Reboot or Restart Device

If that doesn't work try to add more sleep time between do & done

——————————————————

if that doesn't work, maybe your device need more time before it mounts root vanced youtube/music apk.
just modify vanced.sh and or music.sh, 
insert a new sleep line between 'while' and 'mount' line like:

#!/system/bin/sh
while [ "`getprop sys.boot_completed | tr -d '
' `" != "1" ]; do sleep 1; done
sleep 10
mount -o bind /data/adb/Vanced/base.apk /data/app/com.google.android.youtube-....

fields.title: Video arka planda yürütülürken Vanced çöküyorsa
fields.content:
Bu durumun tek sebebi bazı telefon üreticilerinin MIUI, EMUI, ColorOS vb. işletim sistemlerinde uyguladıkları agresif pil optimizasyonlarıdır, bu yüzden Vanced ve MicroG için pil optimizasyonlarının devre dışı bırakılması tavsiye edilir. 

Bunun için yönergeler cihazın üreticisine göre değişmektedir. dontkillmyapp.com gibi bir siteden yardım alabileceğiniz gibi Google'a "[cihaz markası] [cihaz modeli] [Android sürümü] pil optimizasyonu (veya "disable battery optimization")" yazarak arayabilirsiniz.

Eğer yine de bu sorunla karşılaşıyorsanız Telegram veya Discord'da gerekli ayrıntılarla birlikte #bugreport etiketini kullanarak bildirebilirsiniz. Vanced için hata kaydını eklemeyi unutmayın, tüm sistemin hata kaydını GÖNDERMEYİN.

troubleshooting.title: Advertisements in Vanced
troubleshooting.description:
If you are seeing ads in YouTube Vanced or Vanced Music, read this by xfileFIN:

> I need to get it myself to track it down. As simple layout hiding won't work for that.
Not sure how they decide who gets them, it's all server side.
What I do know is that I can't just hide the layout because the same layout is used for the actual videos as well. The code just decides whether or not it shows the ad badge.
Well I could easily hide the ad badge but it would still show the actual ad video, just without labeling it as ad.
I need to get the ad myself to track it down in the code since obfuscation makes it hard.

The home screen and search ads (added by Google) are region based and will not be shown if you’re not in the region it’s active in. Those advertisements are not added by vanced team in any way so if you point your finger at us, we would laugh at you. 

Devs already know that you are getting ads in your region. Please wait patiently for updates till all ads gets blocked. Until then, enjoy vanced and don't spam chat with same.

The temporary solution to fix it would be clearing data and cache of the app or waiting for future updates.

fields.title: Çözüm - 1
fields.content: Geliştiriciler bunu halledene dek root olmayan sürümleri kullanın.

fields.title: Çözüm - 2
fields.content:
GEREKENLER: 

Vanced Manager 2.2.0 veya daha yenisi
1. Manager ayarlarını açın > Root Betiği Uyku Süresi (bu ayarın görünmesi için root olmalısınız) değerini 2'ye ayarlayın > Kaydedin, cihazınızı yeniden başlatın. Eğer Vanced/Music yine görünmezse bu değeri değiştirip tekrar deneyin

troubleshooting.title: History
troubleshooting.description:
If you are facing issues where videos watched/search results are not getting recorded by Vanced i.e., history being not working, this is how you get the history working:

• For users who are rooted regardless of which variant (Non-Root or Root) you are using,

> Make sure you whitelist *s.youtube.com in your Ad-Blocker.

⚠️NOTE for Adaway users: If whitelisting the URL didn't work for you, tap on "host sources" and untick "stevenblack" and apply, then reboot and your history will work.⚠️

• For Non-Root users:

> Make sure you're on v14.10.53 or higher for the app to save your watch history. If history still doesn't update, then you need to merge your brand account in (YouTube Settings-https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced) to get history working. (Merging process will clean the current history.)

⚠️NOTE for Adaway users using VPN Ad-Blocking instead of root based Ad-Blocking: If you are not using brand account, make sure to whitelist *s.youtube.com url in allowed list then apply the changes.⚠️

troubleshooting.title: APP loading issues
troubleshooting.description:
If you are facing issues where videos watched/search results are not getting recorded by Vanced i.e., history being not working, this is how you get the history working:

• For users who are rooted regardless of which variant (Non-Root or Root) you are using,

> Make sure you whitelist *s.youtube.com in your Ad-Blocker.

⚠️NOTE for Adaway users: If whitelisting the URL didn't work for you, tap on "host sources" and untick "stevenblack" and apply, then reboot and your history will work.⚠️

• For Non-Root users:

> Make sure you're on v14.10.53 or higher for the app to save your watch history. If history still doesn't update, then you need to merge your brand account in [YouTube Settings](https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced) to get history working. (Merging process will clean the current history.)

⚠️NOTE for Adaway users using VPN Ad-Blocking instead of root based Ad-Blocking: If you are not using brand account, make sure to whitelist *s.youtube.com url in allowed list then apply the changes.⚠️

fields.title: Vanced açılış ekranında takılıp kalıyorsa
fields.content:
1. Uçak modunu açın.
2. Youtube Vanced'i açın.
3. Değişim kaydı penceresinde kapat (close) seçin.
4. Uçak modunu kapatın.
5. Vanced'i tekrar açın.

XDA'dan rocco6victor'a teşekkürler

fields.title: Vanced'in yüklenmesi hiç bitmiyorsa
fields.content:
1. Youtube Vanced ve MicroG için pil optimizasyonunu dontkillmyapp.com yardımıyla devre dışı bırakın ve sonra cihazınızı yeniden başlatın.
2. Sorun düzelmiş olmalı.

troubleshooting.title: App download issues
troubleshooting.description:
⚠️PiP (ekran içinde ekran, görüntü içinde görüntü) ile ilgili sorunları bildirmeyin⚠️
• Vanced, Android'de olan PiP'i kullandığı için PiP sistem tarafından kontrol edilir. PiP ile ilgili bir sorun yaşıyorsanız işletim sisteminizi suçlayın.
MX Player, VLC gibi başka uygulamalar kendi PiP'lerini kullandıkları için Android PiP'iyle ilgili sorunlar onlarda olmayabilir veya tam tersi.

• PiP, Android 8 ve sonrasında mevcuttur.

• PiP'i etkinleştirmek için Youtube uygulaması ayarlarını açın > Genel > Ekran içinde ekranı etkinleştirin.

> PiP'i MIUI'da etkinleştirmek için:
Gizlilik koruması > Yönet > Özel izinler > Görüntü içinde görüntü

V15.43.32'de resmî Youtube uygulamasından kaynaklanan bir PiP hatası var, Google'ın çözmesi gerekiyor.

fields.title: Workaround 1
fields.content:
In case the detach methods listed above doesn't work for you, you can try the ones down below:

Using Titanium backup app(needs pro version)

• Open titanium backup 

• Search for youtube and Click on it 

• Swipe left to access special features 

• Click on Attach to market 

• Then again go to special features 

• Click on 'detach from market' 

• Done

fields.title: Workaround 2
fields.content:
NOTE: Auto-Updates must be disabled in play store before doing this.

1. Create "Detach.txt" in the following location /sdcard/ (equivalent to /storage/emulated/0/) write "YouTube" in that text file without quotes. You can also download the Detach.txt from Magisk module name Detach and remove the # in front of YouTube.

2. Flash Detach module in Magisk manager.

3. Flash Daily Job Scheduler (djs) in Magisk manager.

4. Reboot

5. Open Terminal and type "su -c detach -t" and set it to run once every hour.

6. Done!

Play Store updates its database file on a random rhythm, sometimes several times a day. Once in a while (like once every two weeks), Play Store will show an update for Youtube, but it will go away when the script has run again by djs.

troubleshooting.title: Fix For SAI/Vanced Manager errors
troubleshooting.description: You can use any of the workarounds listed below to remove the YouTube app from the market.

fields.title: Workaround 1(Recommended)
fields.content:
Using [TeMiFi app](https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/app-tool-temefi-comprehensive-system-administration.3806260), Make sure the YouTube Vanced is a user app as this method won't work if Vanced is installed as a system app.

In TeMeFi select > Give root permissions > Tap on Application info > Detach package from play store > DETACH: Select package then protection level v5 > Select YouTube with package name "com.google.android.youtube" > Tap on 3. Invalidate the data, block any attempt.... > Yes, I accept full responsibility

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_UPDATE_INCOMPATIBE
fields.content:
Using Titanium backup app(needs pro version)

• Open titanium backup 

• Search for youtube and Click on it 

• Swipe left to access special features 

• Click on Attach to market 

• Then again go to special features 

• Click on "detach from market" 

• Done

fields.title: Workaround 3
fields.content:
NOTE: Auto-Updates must be disabled in play store before doing this.

1. Create "Detach.txt" in the following location /sdcard/ (equivalent to /storage/emulated/0/) write "YouTube" in that text file without quotes. You can also download the Detach.txt from Magisk module name Detach and remove the # in front of YouTube.

2. Flash Detach module in Magisk manager.

3. Flash Daily Job Scheduler (djs) in Magisk manager.

4. Reboot

5. Open Terminal and type "su -c detach -t" and set it to run once every hour.

6. Done!

Play Store updates its database file on a random rhythm, sometimes several times a day. Once in a while (like once every two weeks), Play Store will show an update for Youtube, but it will go away when the script has run again by djs.

fields.title: Workaround 4
fields.content: Switch to Non-Root variant of Vanced. This workaround should only be used as a last resort if all of the other options fail!

troubleshooting.title: Live-Stream issues
troubleshooting.description: Solution: Follow this guide > https://youtu.be/R9asMVCQkAU. Also, disable your external ad-blockers/vpn/proxy/custom settings in vanced. Keep stock settings if you don't wanna see any issues.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_VERSION_DOWNGRADE
fields.content: Resmî Youtube uygulamasının güncelleştirmelerini kaldırın. Fabrika sürümü Youtube uygulamasının sürüm sayısının, yüklemek istediğiniz Vanced sürümünden daha küçük olması gerekir.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_UPDATE_INCOMPATIBLE
fields.content:
Başka kaynaktan indirdiğiniz tüm Vanced uygulamalarını kaldırıp Vanced'i öyle yükleyin. Yoksa "Vanced MicroG"yi kaldırın > Cihazı yeniden başlatın > Önce Vanced MicroG'yi ardından Vanced'i yükleyin. Eğer hâlâ hata alıyorsanız Vanced'i yüklemek için SAI'yı kullanın. Yüklenecek apk dosyaları aşağıdaki konumdadır 
"android / data / com.vanced.manager / files / vanced / nonroot / "

fields.title: INSTALL_PARSE_FAILED_NOT_APK
fields.content: Cihazınızın dilini İngilizceye çevirin ve Vanced'i öyle kurun. Kurulumdan sonra dili tekrar değiştirebilirsiniz. Youtube Vanced'i kurmak istediğiniz dili Vanced Manager içinden ayarladığınıza emin olun.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_NO_MATCHING_ABIS
fields.content: "Default" yerine "legacy" sürümü indirin

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_APK: Split config.en was defined multiple times
fields.content: apks dosyasındaki split_config.en apk dosyasını silin ve bundan sonra kurmayı deneyin (apks dosyası bir arşiv dosyasıdır, içindeki bir apk dosyasını kolayca silebilirsiniz)

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_DUPLICATE_PERMISSION
fields.content:
MicroG'yi kaldırın > yeniden başlatın > SAI kullanarak Vanced'i kurun > MicroG'yi kurun

MicroG kurulmuyorsa onu da SAI ile kurun.

fields.title: Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
fields.content:
MicroG'yi kaldırın > yeniden başlatın > SAI kullanarak Vanced'i kurun > MicroG'yi apk yükleyiciyle kurun
MicroG kurulmuyorsa onu da SAI ile kurun.

fields.title: APP IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH THIS DEVICE
fields.content: Resmî Vanced yansılarından indirirken "default" yerine "legacy" mimarisini seçin.

fields.title: INSTALL_PARSE_FAILED_NO_CERTIFICATES
fields.content: It seems like you didn't read instructions properly and installed vanced without disabling signature verification. or you tried some method which didn't give any positive result, so the solution to both is to disable signature verification using the best method/alternative to what you used before or just use our [vanced manager](https://vancedapp.com) which doesn't require you to disable signature verification.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_INSTALL_LOCATION
fields.content: Cihazınızın ayarlar menüsünden geliştirici seçeneklerine ulaşın ve "uygulamaları harici depolamayı kullanmaya zorla" seçeneğini kapatın. Bundan sonra Vanced'i SAI ile kurabilirsiniz.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_USER_RESTRICTED: Install canceled by user
fields.content: Bilinmeyen kaynaklardan uygulama yüklenmesi için SAI'ye izin verin. Bundan sonra Vanced'i yükleyebilirsiniz.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INTERNAL_ERROR: Permission Denied
fields.content: Cihazınızın ayarlar menüsündeki geliştirici seçeneklerinden MIUI optimizasyonunu kapatın.

troubleshooting.title: Whitelisting
troubleshooting.description:
If you face crashes on YouTube Vanced root variants for whitelisting causes, you can try this guide from this link(https://www.xda-developers.com/how-to-fix-device-not-certified-by-google-error) and see if it solves for you.

 Alternatively, if link didn't helps, clean flash your ROM to fix this issue or check with a different ROM.

troubleshooting.title: Black screen video fix
troubleshooting.description:
Solution: clearing data of Youtube Vanced and subsequently reinstalling it should fix the issue. If it doesn't, try a Reboot &
Check if black screen issue solves. 

If problem persist, factory reset your device or change the ROM.

troubleshooting.title: Content Restrictions
troubleshooting.description:
In English it is callled "restricted mode"
In arabic it is called "وضع تقييد المحتوى"

To solve issue of lesser search results, do this

1. Go to settings > General

2. Find "restricted mode" and turn it off.

If you're in a country that Google hates, use a vpn.

troubleshooting.title: View count change
troubleshooting.description:
To change the view count from crores/lakhs to millions, do this:


Solution:

1. Go to settings (of your phone)

2. Go to system 

3. Go to language preferences

4. Add a language as English (US) 

5. Drag this language above your current one.

6. Go to youtube and enjoy ⚡

Thanks to @ROG_OK from telegram Vanced group for finding the fix.

troubleshooting.title: Captions
troubleshooting.description:
If you face caption issues such as random subtitles of different languages on an english video, here's what you have to do;
Set the caption language to your region language in your caption settings.

To access caption settings, head to device settings > accessibility > captions

Or

YouTube settings > captions

troubleshooting.title: HDR brightness Workaround
troubleshooting.description: Use the swiping features to turn the brightness to its maximum

troubleshooting.title: Settings crashes
troubleshooting.description: Turn off your fingerprint and go in the settings and do your setting, after it's done, turn it back on. It won't crash again after that, even if you keep going in it unless you restart your device.
